description: As you open presents this holiday season, keep a pitcher of these Christmas Mimosas on hand. To make Christmas Mimosas, mix&nbsp;prosecco with fresh green apples, cranberries, and pomegranate seeds. Prosecco is a light Italian wine that tastes similar to champagne and makes a delicious base for these winter drinks.
name: Christmosas
recipeIngredient: 1 (750 ml.) bottle of Champagne, Prosecco, or Cava

recipeInstructions.name: Combine the apples, cranberries, grapes, and pomegranate seeds in a large pitcher or punch bowl.

recipeInstructions.name: To serve, pour over sparkling grape juice and Champagne and stir well.
